author: Ron Kohavi and Dan Sommerfield
title: To Appear in KDD-98 Targeting Business Users with Decision Table Classifiers
venue: Data Mining and Visualization Silicon Graphics, Inc
window: In fact, it is quite surprising to see how well decision tables perform with five or fewer attributes. Out of 16 natural datasets, only DNA and german used more than five attributes (chess is semi-natural) with DTMaj, and only DNA and letter used more than seven attributes with DTLoc.
